title: Information from a Boxplot: Odometer Readings
question_text: A car's odometer keeps track of how many miles the car has been driven.  A transportation safety group was interested in knowing the average odometer reading of cars that are currently being driven and decided to investigate.  To gather data, they surveyed a random sample of $80\text{ licensed drivers}$ .  Each driver was asked to report the odometer reading on the car that they drive the most.  Results of the survey are shown in the boxplot below. Loading question supplement... Which of the following statements is correct?

choices.text: The median is about 58 miles 58 miles .
About half of those surveyed said their car odometer reading was below 70,000 miles 70,000 miles .
Approximately 40 drivers 40 drivers said their car odometer reading was between about 32,000 32,000 and 72,000 miles 72,000 miles .
The outlier shown is not really an outlier.
